content.text:
Not sure which client you're using, but in Patchwork you can:

1. Select "More"
2. Select "Settings"
3. Select the messages you want to hide (my setup is below):
  - [x] Hide following messages
  - [x] Hide channel (un)subcribe messages
  - [ ] Hide posts in channels that are not subscribed
  - [x] Hide channel (un)subcribe messages

I liked being able to see follow/unfollow messages when I first joined the #scuttleverse, but after the append-only feed thing clicks I'm not sure how useful seeing *every* message is.
